example.eg: Bend forwards at the waist with your feet planted wide.
example.egtrans: 腰部向前弯曲，双脚张开。

example.eg: The car moved slowly forward.
example.egtrans: 这辆车缓慢地向前行驶。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向前, 朝前, 往前

example.eg: We moved forward with the project after the boss said yes.
example.egtrans: 老板同意后，我们便继续开展项目。

example.eg: The forward part of a ship is called the bow.
example.egtrans: 船的前面部分叫舰首。

example.eg: That remark was rather forward of him.
example.egtrans: 他那句话太放肆了。

example.eg: Click on this arrow to forward the email.
example.egtrans: 点击箭头即可转发邮件。

example.eg: Let me forward this email to you.
example.egtrans: 我来把这封邮件转发给你。

example.eg: The flat's new tenant was kind enough to forward my mail.
example.egtrans: 公寓新租客很热心，转寄了我的邮件。

example.eg: The woman living in my old apartment forwarded all my mail to me.
example.egtrans: 现在住在我旧公寓里的女士把我所有的邮件都转寄给我了。

example.eg: They made a forward purchase of copper and steel.
example.egtrans: 他们买了铜和钢材的期货。

example.eg: The crew cabin is forward of the galley.
example.egtrans: 船员舱位于游艇前部。

example.eg: She's the team's best forward.
example.egtrans: 她是球队最好的前锋。

example.eg: Mike plays forward for the team.
example.egtrans: 迈克在球队打前锋。

example.eg: I'll forward the information that you asked for.
example.egtrans: 我会把你要求的信息转发给你。

example.eg: He's only interested in forwarding his career.
I hope the doctor's surgery can bring my appointment forward, as I'll be on holiday next week.
example.egtrans: 我希望可以把我预约的医生手术提前，因为我下周开始放假。

example.eg: Carry the number forward from the units to the tens column.
A team of experts is being assembled to carry the project forward.
The investigators pleaded for anyone with information about the crime to come forward.
example.egtrans: 调查人员呼吁任何了解犯罪信息的人站出来。

example.eg: When they requested volunteers, I came forward since I had nothing better to do.
example.egtrans: 他们提出需要志愿者的时候，我自告奋勇，反正也没有什么事可做。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自告奋勇, 主动请缨

example.eg: The preacher said; "Come forward now if you feel the spirit."
example.egtrans: 传道者说：“如果你感觉到神灵的召唤，现在就走过来。”

example.eg: The new legislation was driven forward by fears of mass immigration.
Instead of reversing, he drove forward into a tree.
Don't forget that the clocks go forward tonight.
example.egtrans: 别忘了，今晚调夏令时，要把时钟拨快。

example.eg: I can't seem to go forward in my career.
example.egtrans: 我的事业似乎止步不前，毫无进展。

example.eg: On New Year's Day, many of us like to look forward and think about the positive changes we can make over the coming year.
example.egtrans: 新年那一天，我们中的许多人喜欢展望未来，思考着自己来年能有什么积极向上的转变。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 展望未来, 看向前方

example.eg: We look forward to our summer holiday every year.
example.egtrans: 我们每年都期盼着暑假。

example.eg: I look forward to the day when I can afford to retire.
example.egtrans: 我期待着我能退休的一天。

example.eg: The herd pressed forward, driven by fear of the men behind them.
Hannibal's army pushed forward over the Alps.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不断推进, 向前推进

example.eg: Although she did not receive enough financial aid, she pushed forward with her plan to attend the university.
The responsibilities were so overwhelming that no-one wanted to put himself forward.
example.egtrans: 要承担的责任太大，没人愿意自告奋勇。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 提出, 建议, 提议

dsense.name: step forward
dsense.guideword: figurative (present oneself, volunteer) (比喻自愿做某事)

example.eg: When the little girl went missing, many people stepped forward to search for her.
example.egtrans: 那名小女孩失踪后，许多人都自告奋勇去搜寻她。

example.eg: When you hear your name called, please step forward.
example.egtrans: 当你的名字被念到时，请走上前来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向前走，前进, 走上前来

example.eg: Steve has a great idea for a business, he just needs to find some investors to help him take it forward.

dsense.name: backwards and forwards, backward and forward

example.eg: I've spent the whole day rushing backwards and forwards.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 来来回回, 反反复复

dsense.name: backwards and forwards, backward and forward

example.eg: Ed searched the records backwards and forwards.

dsense.name: carryover, also UK: carry-over, carryforward, also UK: carry-forward

trans_examp.trans_cn: 时尚前沿的, 前卫的

example.eg: Fast forward to the last five minutes of the film clip - that's the funniest bit.
I often fast forward through the boring parts of movies.
He hit fast forward, and images in the film sped by.
Everything was happening so fast that she felt as though her life were on fast forward.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 快速前进, 快速前行

example.eg: The article discusses how the forward market for coffee operates.
The assigned forward observer was killed by a sniper.
The gymnasts were practising their forward rolls.
We see ourselves as a forward-looking organization.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有远见的, 高瞻远瞩的
超前思维的, 有前瞻性的

example.eg: From this point forward I won't smoke in the house any more.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从现在开始, 从此时起

example.eg: Going forward, we really need to change how we do business.
example.egtrans: 展望未来，我们确实需要改变从事业务的方式。

dsense.name: I look forward to hearing from you
dsense.guideword: written, slightly formal (application, request: signing off) (申请、请求：落款，书面)

example.eg: Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

dsense.name: I look forward to your reply
dsense.guideword: written, slightly formal (application, request: signing off)

example.eg: Thank you for your consideration, and I look forward to your reply.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 期待您的回复, 期待收到您的答复

example.eg: Locks are an important part of a rugby scrum.
Put the car in gear so you can move forward.
example.egtrans: 给汽车挂上档，这样你就能向前开了。

example.eg: Now that I have the supplies I need, I can move forward with my project.  We've moved forward as a country since the days of racial and gender discrimination.
example.egtrans: 有了所需的物资，我就能推进自己项目了。跟种族与性别歧视横行的时代相比，我们的国家已经取得了进步。

example.eg: In order to rotate the stock, move the old product forward and put the new product behind it on the shelf.
example.egtrans: 要周转存货，把旧货放到架子上靠前的位置，把新货放到旧货的后面。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...移动到靠前的位置, 把…向前推进, 把...放到前面来

example.eg: I've rolled a four and a three, so I can move forward seven spaces.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 让爱传出去, 把这份情传递下去

example.eg: The passengers all pitched forward when the bus braked very suddenly.
I'm not really much good at it but I'll put my best foot forward.
Put your best foot forward at the job interview.
With their saddlebags full and joy in their hearts, they set forward on their quest.

dsense.name: the way forward
dsense.guideword: figurative (how to progress, what to do next)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 前进的路, 进步之路, 下一步
